t: Can I have two brand stores each in one account?
s: ... My name is Dougal from the Community Manager Team and I am happy to answer your question. Yes, you can have 2 brand stores in one Selling Account. In fact, this is the requirement if you have multiple brands. Currently, you can only have 1 store per brand.

t: r/amazon on Reddit: Why does Amazon allow identical products with different brand names?
